thread.title: Beth

author: Beth
title: Beth
text:
I joined Trusted Housesitters after returning from a few years of international teaching. I wasn't sure where I wanted to settle back in the USA so have spent the past few months housesitting and exploring areas of California I may want to relocate to. I plan to go to Europe next, Ireland specifically, and will look for housesitting opportunities there over the summer.
It's been a great way to meet people, their pets and see places! I highly recommend the site.
